name: Four Seasons Ventures
overview: Four Seasons Ventures, LLC is a private equity firm specializing in investments in commercialization of revolutionary next generation technologies developed by the United States Government (USG) research agencies. The firm seeks to invest in opportunities with a proprietary position and a clear path to commercialization. It primarily invests in technologies with clear and defensible Government and private sector applications and that will garner United States government support and target large unmet demand. The firm does not invest in software, telecommunications, biotech, and anything requiring FDA approval. Four Seasons Ventures, LLC was founded in 2000 and is based in Washington, District of Columbia.

funding_round.source_description: Affomix Corporation Lands $7 Million Series A
